Symbol.Script_3D:
!! fa_cabinet_legtyp/Macro
!-----Definitions----- FORM_SQUARE = 1 FORM_CORNER_L = 2 FORM_CORNER_C = 3
EPS = 0.0001 thickness = 0.02
if leg_h < EPS then end
PEN gs_cont_pen MATERIAL gs_leg_mat
! ============================================================================== ! FORM_SQUARE ! ============================================================================== if iCabinetForm = FORM_SQUARE then IF gs_detlevel_3D_m=1 then gs_leg_type_m=1
!!!*** For Style 1,5 IF gs_lining_m=1 THEN dist=-(a-2*side_overhang-leg_w)/2 IF gs_lining_m=2 THEN dist=-(a-leg_w)/2 IF gs_lining_m=3 THEN dist=-(a-2*side_overhang-leg_w)/2 IF gs_lining_m=4 THEN dist=-(a-leg_w)/2
IF gs_lining_m=1 THEN dd=a-2*side_overhang-leg_w IF gs_lining_m=2 THEN dd=a-side_overhang-leg_w IF gs_lining_m=3 THEN dd=a-side_overhang-leg_w IF gs_lining_m=4 THEN dd=a-leg_w
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Style 1/rectangle
IF gs_leg_type_m=1 THEN
ADD dist,-leg_w/2,0
FOR r=1 TO 2 FOR i=1 TO 2 gosub "LegStyle_01" ADDX dd NEXT i DEL 2 ADDY -b+cooh+leg_w NEXT r DEL 2
DEL 1
ENDIF
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Style 2/round
IF gs_leg_type_m=2 OR gs_leg_type_m=3 THEN
RR=leg_w/2 tt=0.01
IF gs_lining_m=1 THEN dist2=-(a-2*side_overhang-2*RR)/2 IF gs_lining_m=2 THEN dist2=-(a-2*RR)/2 IF gs_lining_m=3 THEN dist2=-(a-2*side_overhang-2*RR)/2 IF gs_lining_m=4 THEN dist2=-(a-2*RR)/2
IF gs_lining_m=1 THEN dd2=(a-2*side_overhang-2*RR-2*tt) IF gs_lining_m=2 THEN dd2=(a-side_overhang-2*RR-2*tt) IF gs_lining_m=3 THEN dd2=(a-side_overhang-2*RR-2*tt) IF gs_lining_m=4 THEN dd2=(a-2*RR-2*tt)
RESOL gs_resol ADD dist2,-RR,0 FOR r=1 TO vl FOR i=1 TO hl ADD tt,-tt,0 gosub "LegStyle_02_03" DEL 1 ADDX dd2/(hl-1) NEXT i DEL hl ADDY (-b+cooh+2*RR+2*tt)/(vl-1) NEXT r DEL vl DEL 1
ENDIF
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Style 4
IF gs_leg_type_m=4 and gs_lining_m=4 THEN PRISM_ 4,leg_h, -a/2+leg_w,0,15, -a/2+leg_w,-leg_w,15, a/2-leg_w,-leg_w,15, a/2-leg_w,0,15
PRISM_ 4,leg_h, -a/2,0,15, -a/2,-b+cooh,15, -a/2+leg_w,-b+cooh,15, -a/2+leg_w,0,15
PRISM_ 4,leg_h, a/2,0,15, a/2,-b+cooh,15, a/2-leg_w,-b+cooh,15, a/2-leg_w,0,15
ADDY -b+cooh+leg_w+leg_w PRISM_ 4,leg_h, -a/2+leg_w,0,15, -a/2+leg_w,-leg_w,15, a/2-leg_w,-leg_w,15, a/2-leg_w,0,15 DEL 1 ENDIF
IF gs_leg_type_m=4 and gs_lining_m=2 THEN PRISM_ 4,leg_h, -a/2+leg_w,0,15, -a/2+leg_w,-leg_w,15, a/2-side_overhang-leg_w,-leg_w,15, a/2-side_overhang-leg_w,0,15
PRISM_ 4,leg_h, -a/2,0,15, -a/2,-b+cooh,15, -a/2+leg_w,-b+cooh,15, -a/2+leg_w,0,15
PRISM_ 4,leg_h, a/2-side_overhang,0,15, a/2-side_overhang,-b+cooh,15, a/2-side_overhang-leg_w,-b+cooh,15, a/2-side_overhang-leg_w,0,15
ADDY -b+cooh+leg_w+leg_w PRISM_ 4,leg_h, -a/2+leg_w,0,15, -a/2+leg_w,-leg_w,15, a/2-side_overhang-leg_w,-leg_w,15, a/2-side_overhang-leg_w,0,15 DEL 1 ENDIF
IF gs_leg_type_m=4 and gs_lining_m=3 THEN PRISM_ 4,leg_h, -a/2+side_overhang+leg_w,0,15, -a/2+side_overhang+leg_w,-leg_w,15, a/2-leg_w,-leg_w,15, a/2-leg_w,0,15
PRISM_ 4,leg_h, -a/2+side_overhang,0,15, -a/2+side_overhang,-b+cooh,15, -a/2+side_overhang+leg_w,-b+cooh,15, -a/2+side_overhang+leg_w,0,15
PRISM_ 4,leg_h, a/2,0,15, a/2,-b+cooh,15, a/2-leg_w,-b+cooh,15, a/2-leg_w,0,15
ADDY -b+cooh+leg_w+leg_w PRISM_ 4,leg_h, -a/2+side_overhang+leg_w,0,15, -a/2+side_overhang+leg_w,-leg_w,15, a/2-leg_w,-leg_w,15, a/2-leg_w,0,15 DEL 1 ENDIF
IF gs_leg_type_m=4 and gs_lining_m=1 THEN PRISM_ 4,leg_h, -a/2+side_overhang+leg_w,0,15, -a/2+side_overhang+leg_w,-leg_w,15, a/2-side_overhang-leg_w,-leg_w,15, a/2-side_overhang-leg_w,0,15
PRISM_ 4,leg_h, -a/2+side_overhang,0,15, -a/2+side_overhang,-b+cooh,15, -a/2+side_overhang+leg_w,-b+cooh,15, -a/2+side_overhang+leg_w,0,15
PRISM_ 4,leg_h, a/2-side_overhang,0,15, a/2-side_overhang,-b+cooh,15, a/2-side_overhang-leg_w,-b+cooh,15, a/2-side_overhang-leg_w,0,15
ADDY -b+cooh+leg_w+leg_w PRISM_ 4,leg_h, -a/2+side_overhang+leg_w,0,15, -a/2+side_overhang+leg_w,-leg_w,15, a/2-side_overhang-leg_w,-leg_w,15, a/2-side_overhang-leg_w,0,15 DEL 1 ENDIF
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Style 5
IF gs_leg_type_m=5 THEN
IF gs_lining_m=1 THEN Temp=cooh IF gs_lining_m=2 THEN Temp=cooh/2 IF gs_lining_m=3 THEN Temp=cooh/2 IF gs_lining_m=4 THEN Temp=0
IF gs_lining_m=1 THEN Temp2=side_overhang IF gs_lining_m=2 THEN Temp2=side_overhang/2 IF gs_lining_m=3 THEN Temp2=side_overhang/2 IF gs_lining_m=4 THEN Temp2=0
IF gs_lining_m=1 THEN TempX=0 IF gs_lining_m=2 THEN TempX=-side_overhang/2 IF gs_lining_m=3 THEN TempX=side_overhang/2 IF gs_lining_m=4 THEN TempX=0
RESOl 8*gs_resol
hura=SQR((0.5*leg_h*3/4)**2+(a/2-Temp2-leg_w)**2) ra=(hura*hura/2)/(0.5*leg_h*3/4)
hurb=SQR((0.5*leg_h*3/4)**2+(b/2-Temp/2-leg_w)**2) rb=(hurb*hurb/2)/(0.5*leg_h*3/4)
FOR i=1 TO 2 !* Front, Rear
ROTX 90 ADD TempX,leg_h*1/4,leg_w/2-leg_w/4 PRISM_ 5,leg_w/2, -a/2+Temp2+leg_w,0,79, 0,-ra+0.5*leg_h*3/4,900, a/2-Temp2-leg_w,0,3015, a/2-Temp2-leg_w,leg_h*3/4,15, -a/2+Temp2+leg_w,leg_h*3/4,15 gosub "textureHorizontal_01" DEL 1 DEL 1
ADDY -b+cooh+leg_w NEXT i DEL 2
FOR i=1 TO 2 !* Left, Right
ADDX dist ROTZ 90 ROTX 90 ADD -leg_w,leg_h*1/4,-leg_w/4 PRISM_ 5,leg_w/2, -b+cooh+leg_w+leg_w,0,79, (-b+cooh+leg_w+leg_w)/2,-rb+0.5*leg_h*3/4,900, 0,0,3015, 0,leg_h*3/4,15, -b+cooh+leg_w+leg_w,leg_h*3/4,15 gosub "textureHorizontal_01" DEL 1 DEL 1 DEL 1 DEL 1
ADDX dd NEXT i DEL 2
ADD dist,-leg_w/2,0
FOR r=1 TO 2 FOR i=1 TO 2 gosub "LegStyle_01" ADDX dd NEXT i DEL 2 ADDY -b+cooh+leg_w NEXT r DEL 2
DEL 1
ENDIF
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Style 6
IF gs_leg_type_m=6 THEN
IF gs_lining_m=1 THEN Temp=A-side_overhang*2 IF gs_lining_m=2 THEN Temp=A-side_overhang IF gs_lining_m=3 THEN Temp=A-side_overhang IF gs_lining_m=4 THEN Temp=A
IF gs_lining_m=1 THEN TempX=side_overhang IF gs_lining_m=2 THEN TempX=0 IF gs_lining_m=3 THEN TempX=side_overhang IF gs_lining_m=4 THEN TempX=0
addx -A/2 RESOl 8*gs_resol legRadius = leg_h / 4 legW = leg_w - thickness
for i=1 to 2 !* Left, Right panel prism_ 4,leg_h, TempX, -B+cooh, 15, TempX+thickness, -B+cooh+thickness, 15, TempX+thickness, -thickness, 15, TempX, 0, 15 gosub "textureHorizontal_01" if legW > EPS then prism_ 4, leg_h, ! Leg TempX+thickness, -B+cooh+thickness, 15, TempX+thickness, -B+cooh+thickness+legW, 15, TempX+thickness+legW, -B+cooh+thickness+legW, 15, TempX+thickness+legW, -B+cooh+thickness, 15 gosub "textureVertical_01"
prism_ 4, leg_h, ! Leg TempX+thickness, -thickness, 15, TempX+thickness, -thickness-legW, 15, TempX+thickness+legW, -thickness-legW, 15, TempX+thickness+legW, -thickness, 15 gosub "textureVertical_01" endif mulx -1 addx -Temp-2*TempX next i del 4
prism_ 4,leg_h, !* Rear TempX, 0, 15, Temp+TempX, 0, 15, Temp+TempX-thickness, -thickness, 15, TempX+thickness, -thickness, 15
if Temp > 2*leg_w + 2*legRadius then rotx 90 cutpolya 8, 0, 0, TempX+leg_w, 0, 15, TempX+leg_w, legRadius, 79, TempX+leg_w+legRadius, legRadius, 900, TempX+leg_w+legRadius, 2*legRadius, 3079, Temp+TempX-leg_w-legRadius, 2*legRadius, 79, Temp+TempX-leg_w-legRadius, legRadius, 900, Temp+TempX-leg_w, legRadius, 3079, Temp+TempX-leg_w, 0, 15 del 1 endif
prism_ 4,leg_h, !* Front TempX, -B+cooh, 15, Temp+TempX, -B+cooh, 15, Temp+TempX-thickness, -B+cooh+thickness, 15, TempX+thickness, -B+cooh+thickness, 15
if Temp > 2*leg_w + 2*legRadius then cutend
del 1
ENDIF else ! ============================================================================== ! FORM_CORNER_L, FORM_CORNER_C ! ============================================================================== sideDepth1 = sideDepth1 - side_overhang sideDepth2 = sideDepth2 - cooh if gs_lining_m=3 or gs_lining_m=1 then b = b - cooh if gs_lining_m=2 or gs_lining_m=1 then a = a - side_overhang
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Style 1/rectangle
if gs_leg_type_m=1 or gs_leg_type_m=5 then add leg_w/2,-leg_w/2,0 gosub "LegStyle_01" del 1
add A-leg_w/2,-leg_w/2,0 gosub "LegStyle_01" del 1
add leg_w/2, -B+leg_w/2,0 gosub "LegStyle_01" del 1
add sideDepth1-leg_w/2, -B+leg_w/2,0 gosub "LegStyle_01" del 1
add A-leg_w/2, -sideDepth2+leg_w/2,0 gosub "LegStyle_01" del 1
if iCabinetForm = FORM_CORNER_L then add sideDepth1-leg_w/2, -sideDepth2+leg_w/2,0 gosub "LegStyle_01" del 1 endif endif
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Style 2/3 round
if gs_leg_type_m=2 OR gs_leg_type_m=3 THEN RR=leg_w/2 tt=0.01+RR
add tt,-tt,0 gosub "LegStyle_02_03" del 1
add A-tt,-tt,0 gosub "LegStyle_02_03" del 1
add tt, -B+tt,0 gosub "LegStyle_02_03" del 1
add sideDepth1-tt, -B+tt,0 gosub "LegStyle_02_03" del 1
add A-tt, -sideDepth2+tt,0 gosub "LegStyle_02_03" del 1
if iCabinetForm = FORM_CORNER_L then add sideDepth1-tt, -sideDepth2+tt,0 gosub "LegStyle_02_03" del 1 endif endif
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Style 4
if gs_leg_type_m=4 then prism_ 4,leg_h, 0,0,15, a-leg_w,0,15, a-leg_w,-leg_w,15, leg_w,-leg_w,15 gosub "textureHorizontal_01"
prism_ 4,leg_h, 0,0,15, leg_w,-leg_w,15, leg_w,-b+leg_w,15, 0,-b+leg_w,15 gosub "textureHorizontal_02"
if iCabinetForm = FORM_CORNER_L then prism_ 4,leg_h, 0, -b+leg_w,15, sideDepth1, -b+leg_w,15, sideDepth1, -b,15, 0,-b,15 gosub "textureHorizontal_01"
prism_ 4,leg_h, a,0,15, a,-sideDepth2,15, a-leg_w,-sideDepth2,15, a-leg_w,0,15 gosub "textureHorizontal_02"
prism_ 4,leg_h, sideDepth1-2*leg_w, -sideDepth2+2*leg_w,15, sideDepth1-leg_w, -sideDepth2+leg_w,15, sideDepth1-leg_w, -B+leg_w,15, sideDepth1-2*leg_w, -B+leg_w,15 gosub "textureHorizontal_02"
prism_ 4,leg_h, sideDepth1-2*leg_w, -sideDepth2+2*leg_w,15, sideDepth1-leg_w, -sideDepth2+leg_w,15, a-leg_w, -sideDepth2+leg_w,15, a-leg_w, -sideDepth2+2*leg_w,15 gosub "textureHorizontal_01" else if abs(sideDepth1-a)< EPS or abs(sideDepth2-b) < EPS then alpha = 90 else alpha = atn((b-sideDepth2)/(a-sideDepth1)) endif
prism_ 4,leg_h, 0, -b+leg_w,15, sideDepth1+leg_w/tan(alpha), -b+leg_w,15, sideDepth1, -b,15, 0,-b,15 gosub "textureHorizontal_01"
prism_ 4,leg_h, a,0,15, a,-sideDepth2,15, a-leg_w,-sideDepth2-leg_w*tan(alpha),15, a-leg_w,0,15 gosub "textureHorizontal_02"
beta = (180-alpha)/2 gamma = (90-alpha)/2
prism_ 4,leg_h, sideDepth1-leg_w/tan(beta), -B+leg_w,15, sideDepth1-leg_w/tan(beta) - leg_w/sin(alpha), -B+leg_w,15, a-leg_w,-sideDepth2+leg_w*tan(gamma)+leg_w/sin(90-alpha),15, a-leg_w,-sideDepth2+leg_w*tan(gamma),15 gosub "textureAlha"
endif endif
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Style 5
if gs_leg_type_m=5 then resol 8*gs_resol
TempX = (B-2*leg_w)/2 rotz -90 add b/2, leg_w/2+leg_w/4, 0 gosub "LegStyle_05" del 2
TempX = (sideDepth2-2*leg_w)/2 rotz -90 add sideDepth2/2, A-leg_w/2+leg_w/4, 0 gosub "LegStyle_05" del 2
TempX = (A-2*leg_w)/2 add A/2, -leg_w/4, 0 gosub "LegStyle_05" del 1
TempX = (sideDepth1-2*leg_w)/2 add sideDepth1/2, -B+leg_w/4+leg_w/2, 0 gosub "LegStyle_05" del 1
if iCabinetForm = FORM_CORNER_L then TempX = (B-sideDepth2-leg_w)/2 rotz -90 add B-(B-sideDepth2+leg_w)/2, sideDepth1-leg_w/2+leg_w/4, 0 gosub "LegStyle_05" del 2
TempX = (A-sideDepth1-leg_w)/2 add sideDepth1+(A-sideDepth1-leg_w)/2, -sideDepth2+leg_w/2+leg_w/4, 0 gosub "LegStyle_05" del 1 else if abs(sideDepth1-a)< EPS or abs(sideDepth2-b) < EPS then alpha = 90 else alpha = atn((b-sideDepth2)/(a-sideDepth1)) endif
TempX = ((B-sideDepth2-(leg_w/4)/sin(90-alpha) ) / sin (alpha) ) /2 add sideDepth1+cos(alpha)*Tempx, -B+(leg_w/4)/sin(90-alpha)+sin(alpha)*Tempx, 0 rotz alpha muly -1 gosub "LegStyle_05" del 3 endif endif
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Style 6
if gs_leg_type_m=6 then resol 8*gs_resol legRadius = leg_h / 4 legW = leg_w - thickness
if abs(sideDepth1-a)< EPS or abs(sideDepth2-b) < EPS then alpha = 90 else alpha = atn((b-sideDepth2)/(a-sideDepth1)) endif beta = (180-alpha)/2 gamma = (90-alpha)/2
put 0, 0, 15 put a, 0, 15 put a, -sideDepth2, 15 if iCabinetForm = FORM_CORNER_L then put sideDepth1, -sideDepth2, 15 endif put sideDepth1, -b, 15 put 0, -b, 15 put 0, 0, -1
put a-thickness, -thickness, 15 if iCabinetForm = FORM_CORNER_L then put a-thickness, -sideDepth2+thickness, 15 put sideDepth1-thickness, -sideDepth2+thickness, 15 put sideDepth1-thickness, -B+thickness,15 else put a-thickness, -sideDepth2+thickness*tan(gamma), 15 put sideDepth1-thickness/tan(beta), -B+thickness,15 endif put thickness, -B+thickness,15 put thickness, -thickness,15 put a-thickness, -thickness, -1
if iCabinetForm = FORM_CORNER_L then TempX = (B-sideDepth2) TempX1 = TempX rotz -90 add B-(B-sideDepth2), sideDepth1, 0 if TempX > 2*leg_w + 2*legRadius then gosub "LegStyle_06_Cut" del 2
TempX = (A-sideDepth1) TempX2 = TempX add sideDepth1+TempX, -sideDepth2, 0 mulx -1 if TempX > 2*leg_w + 2*legRadius then gosub "LegStyle_06_Cut" del 2 else TempX = (B-sideDepth2) / sin (alpha) add sideDepth1, -B, 0 rotz alpha+180 addx -TempX if TempX > 2*leg_w + 2*legRadius then gosub "LegStyle_06_Cut" del 3 endif
prism_ nsp/3, leg_h, get (nsp) gosub "textureHorizontal_01"
if iCabinetForm = FORM_CORNER_L then if TempX1 > 2*leg_w + 2*legRadius then cutend if TempX2 > 2*leg_w + 2*legRadius then cutend else if TempX > 2*leg_w + 2*legRadius then cutend endif endif endif
END
! ====================================================================== ! SubRoutines ! ====================================================================== "LegStyle_01": prism_ 4,leg_h, -leg_w/2,-leg_w/2,15, -leg_w/2,leg_w/2,15, leg_w/2,leg_w/2,15, leg_w/2,-leg_w/2,15 gosub "textureVertical_01"
return
"LegStyle_02_03": if gs_leg_type_m=2 then prism_ 2,leg_h, 0,0,979, RR,360,4079 else addz leg_h roty 90 revolve 6,360,1+2, 0,RR,0, leg_h/5-0.0001,RR,0, leg_h/5,RR,1, leg_h/2,-leg_h*leg_h,900, leg_h*4/5,RR,3000, leg_h,RR,0 del 2 endif !gosub "textureVertical_01"
return
"LegStyle_05": !alpha2=1/ATN((0.5*leg_h*3/4)/(TempX)) hura=sqr((0.5*leg_h*3/4)**2+(TempX)**2) ra=(hura*hura/2)/(0.5*leg_h*3/4)
rotx 90 addy leg_h*1/4 prism_ 5,leg_w/2, -TempX,0,79, 0,-ra+0.5*leg_h*3/4,900, TempX,0,3015, TempX,leg_h*3/4,15, -TempX,leg_h*3/4,15 gosub "textureHorizontal_01" del 2 return
"LegStyle_06_Cut": rotx 90 cutpolya 8, 0, -thickness, leg_w, 0, 15, leg_w, legRadius, 79, leg_w+legRadius, legRadius, 900, leg_w+legRadius, 2*legRadius, 3079, TempX-leg_w-legRadius, 2*legRadius, 79, TempX-leg_w-legRadius, legRadius, 900, TempX-leg_w, legRadius, 3079, TempX-leg_w, 0, 15, 0,0,-1 del 1 return
"textureVertical_01": roty 90 vert 0, 0, 0 vert 1, 0, 0 vert 0, 1, 0 vert 0, 0, 1 del 1
coor 2, -1, -2, -3, -4
base
body -1 return
"textureVertical_02": roty 90 rotz 90 vert 0, 0, 0 vert 1, 0, 0 vert 0, 1, 0 vert 0, 0, 1 del 2
coor 2, -1, -2, -3, -4
base
body -1 return
"textureHorizontal_01": vert 0, 0, 0 vert 1, 0, 0 vert 0, 1, 0 vert 0, 0, 1
coor 2, -1, -2, -3, -4
base
body -1 return
"textureHorizontal_02": rotz 90 vert 0, 0, 0 vert 1, 0, 0 vert 0, 1, 0 vert 0, 0, 1 del 1
coor 2, -1, -2, -3, -4
base
body -1 return
"textureAlha": rotz alpha vert 0, 0, 0 vert 1, 0, 0 vert 0, 1, 0 vert 0, 0, 1 del 1
coor 2, -1, -2, -3, -4
base
body -1 return
Symbol.Script_VL:
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2,1
values "gs_leg_type_m" 1,2,3,4,5,6
VALUES "gs_lining_m" 1,2,3,4
values "iCabinetForm" 1,2,3 ! Square (1), Corner-L(2), Corner-C(3)
